item.dc:creator: @Christiaan Christiaan
item.description:
@Christiaan wrote:

Sorry, didnt look very well at urs.
I saw u typed it fast so i was like: maybe there is something wrong
and mine worked in my delta-based server.

Read full topic

item.title: Get ip command for delta
item.dc:creator: @Christiaan Christiaan
item.description:
@Christiaan wrote:

This is mine:

if (playerRights == 3 && (command.startsWith(“getip”))) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(6);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
if (otherPIndex != -1) {
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
sM(“You have gotten the IP address of “+p.playerName+”.”);
sM(“IP Address: “+p.playerLastConnect+”.”);
} else {
sM(“Error retrieving IP Address.”);
}
} catch (Exception e) {
sM(“Invalid; Please use ::getip NAMEHERE”);
}
}

should work on Delta ;D

Read full topic
